function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependent variable is infection ratio","Impact":"No mention of the specific infectious disease being studied","Mitigation":"Specify the specific infectious disease to tailor interventions","Technologies":"Disease surveillance technology, epidemiological models","People":"Residents, commuters, travelers","Owner":"Local public health authorities, transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Standardized explanatory variables","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important non-standardized factors","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analysis with non-standardized variables","Technologies":"Sensitivity analysis tools, statistical software","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of GWR and MLR models for comparison","Impact":"Potential for model misinterpretation or misapplication","Mitigation":"Ensure appropriate interpretation of model results, validate with real-world data","Technologies":"Model validation techniques, real-world data collection and analysis","People":"Analysts, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
